trans_title: 坎那沙塔奇：270年的抗争史
introduction: This film documents the 1990 crisis when Native Americans of the Mohawk Nation blocked access to reserve land which was being appropriated against their will by the White community of Oka, Quebec, Canada. What this film shows is the initial incident and the resulting siege from the Mohawks point of view as an illustration how this is simply a result of resistance to 270 years o...
chinese_title: 坎那沙塔奇：270年的抗争史
